entry.title: a145. Gold Bodhi Travel Shrine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Summit International
Type: Gifts
Price: 34.95

Bodhi is a Sanskrit word that literally means awakened. The bodhi tree was so named because the Buddha attained the awakened state or enlightenment under its spreading canopy. Since then the meaning of this fabled leaf has symbolized the perfection of wisdom in its most ultimate state.

Hand crafted, American Made Triple Deluxe NA book cover: holds the Hardbound NA Basic Text, It Works ,How & Why, and Living Clean. Coin Holder, snap-shut button, silk page holders that say "One Day at a Time," "How It Works" and "Living the Steps" - comes either with NA Symbol or Serenity Prayer.
Medallion and Book(s) NOT Included.

entry.title: a147. Deity Garden: Pocket Deities
entry.summary:
Vendor: Benjamin International
Type: Gifts
Price: 5.95

These small statues are perfect for a garden, desk space, or anywhere else in the home. 

Shiva (Supreme Being): Tasked with destroying the universe in order to prepare for its renewal at the end of each cycle of time. Shiva's destructive power is regenerative and is the necessary step that makes renewal possible. 
Ganesh (Remover of Obstacles): One of the supreme deities and is worshipped in all sects of Hinduism. He is the lord of success, knowledge, and wealth; also known as the remover of obstacles. 
Krishna (Supreme God): Blue skinned Krishna is the deity of love and compassion. His promise to humanity is that he will manifest himself and descend to earth whenever dharma declines.
Lakshmi (Goddess of Prosperity): Goddess of prosperity and wealth that is both material and spiritual. The deity of beauty, purity, and domesticity, the image of Lakshmi is often found in the homes of the faithful. 
Hanuman (Symbol of Strength): Worshipped as a symbol of physical strength, perseverance, and scholarly devotion. Hanuman is usually depicted as the epitome of devoted service and loyalty. 
Medicine Buddha (Supreme Healer): Known in Tibetan Buddhism for healing power. During meditation repeat a mantra to promote healing and release past negative karma.

entry.title: a148. Pocket Buddhas
entry.summary:
Vendor: Benjamin International
Type: Gifts
Price: 5.95

Buddha, meaning the awakened one, is a title for one who has attained nirvana. 

These small statues are perfect for a garden, desk space, or anywhere else in the home. We carry five varieties, each representing different Buddha quotes.

Peace: "Whatever precious jewel there is in the heavenly world, there is nothing comparable to one who is Awakened."
Love: "Radiate boundless love towards the entire world- above, below, and across- unhindered, without ill will, without enmity."
Harmony: "Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment."
Wisdom: "Just as a solid rock is not shaken by the storm, even so was the wise are not affected by praise or blame."
Happiness: "When watching after yourself, you watch after others. When watching after others, you watch after yourself."

entry.title: a149a. Wooden Animal Puzzle Box
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mikutowski Woodworking
Type: Gifts
Price: 24.95

Each puzzle box is uniquely handmade! 

A puzzle box (also called a secret box or trick box) is a box that can be opened only by solving a puzzle. Some require only a simple move and others a series of discoveries. These items make cute decor, and can be a wonderful and unique gift for anyone. 

Dimensions:

Elephant: 4.75" x 5"
Sleeping Cat: 4.5" x 3.5"
Meditation Cat: 2.75" X 5.125"

entry.title: KN95 FACE MASKS / 5 per pack / Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Own A Mask
Type: masks
Price: 14.95

Healthcare services, government agencies, and essential services are given first priority.

These masks are KN95 medical grade masks from China, made of strong but lightweight breathable full mesh nylon material. 

They have 95% filtration of particles >0.3 microns in size. 

More Features:

  • The tip-shaped hanging ear design can prevent this dust-proof mask from slipping
  • Designed for comfortable protection.
  • Lightweight, humidity-resistant and latex-free
  • The elastic fabric completely fits the face, reusable with no peculiar smell.
  • The silicone adjustable nose clip is free to adjust providing user-defined sealing and preventing glasses from fogging.
  • Suitable for different face shapes of men and women.
